Description.val:
LCC EXTENDED SERVICE LIFE PROGRAM
Funds provide for the procurement and installation of equipment in support of LCC 19 Class Extended Service Life Program extending this class to a 2039 service life. Funds specifically provided for LCC electrical improvements, including new ship service diesel generators (SSDGs), switchboards, and brushless ship service turbine generators (SSTGs), VS-50 Oil Water Separator for environmental protection, qualified propulsion shaft, and new air search radar to replace obsolete SPS-40 radar.

Name.@footnote: Procures Main Shaft Battle Spare for rotatable repair pool.
Name.val: 1.1) LCC 20 Propulsion Main Shaft Battle Spare

Name.@footnote: Procurement of the SS/EDG System (24 month PLT) is in FY14 with install in FY16.  Procurement of the SSDG Cooling system (12 month PLT) is in FY15 with install in FY16.  Procurement of the SSTG (12 month PLT) is in FY15 with install in FY16.
For SS/EDGs. Long Lead Time for shock and integration testing.

Description.val: Procurement and installation of upgrades to USS BLUE RIDGE (LCC 19) Electrical System in support of the Extended Service Life Program. Provides a ship set 1825KW Ship Service Emergency Diesel Generators (SS/EDGs), upgrade to existing Ship Service Diesel Generator Cooling System and upgrade of Ship Service Turbine Generators (SSTGs)

Procurement and installation upgrade to USS BLUE RIDGE (LCC 19) Environmental System in support of the Extended Service Life Program. Provides procurement and installation of a VS-50+ Oil Water Separator System.

Name.@footnote: Emergency Diesel Generators procured in FY14 require approximately 4 month land based government testing post delivery.  Procurement of two Emergency Diesel Generators (6 month PLT) is in FY14 with install in FY14 and FY15.  Procurement of Brushless Generators (6 month PLT) is in FY15 with install in FY16.
Approximate 4 month land based government testing.

Description.val: Procurement and installation of upgrade to USS MOUNT WHITNEY (LCC 20) Electrical Distribution System in support of the Extended Service Life Program. Procures and installs two Emergency Diesel Generators and Brushless generators.

Name.@footnote: Procurement of Ship Service Turbine Generator (SSTG) in FY15 with install in FY16, and procurement of Steering system in FY17 with install in FY18.

Description.val: Procurement and installation of upgrades to USS MOUNT WHITNEY (LCC 20) Propulsion and Piping System in support of the Extended Service Life Program.  Procures Ship Service Turbine Generator (SSTG) conversion to brushless, and Steering systems.

Name.@footnote: FY14 installation funds support shipchecks, design integration and drawing development.  These installation advance planning products must be completed by A-360 in support of detailed availability execution planning.

Description.val: Procurement and installation of upgrade to USS BLUE RIDGE (LCC 19) combat system air search capability in support of the Extended Service Life Program. Provides procurement and installation of an air search radar.

Name.@footnote: Procure Ready Life Boat (RHIB) in FY15 with installation in FY16. Procure Decontamination Station and Hazardous Waste Disposal System in FY17 with installation in FY18.

Description.val: Procurement and installation of Safety upgrades to USS MOUNT WHITNEY (LCC 20) in support of the Extended Service Life Program.  Procures upgrade of ship Ready Life Boat (RHIB) and Decontamination Stations and Hazardous Waste Disposal system.
